name: Elixirant
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Pour water

I - Inventory

Esc or P - Pause Game, Exit menus

E - Collect Items, Put items into cauldron, Talk to NPCs

Mouse Wheel or Number keys - Switch items

How To Play:

You need to collect plants to make potions from them and sell those potions to the wizards. Plants grow on their own, but they need to be watered. 

In order to cook you press 'E' on the cauldron with Water Can selected, then you need to select the ingredient for cooking and press 'E' on the cauldron again. To collect the potion you press 'E' on cauldron with any weapon selected. All of the recipes are in the Cook Book.

In order to sell your potions press 'E' on one of the NPCs and drag and drop the potion they want to buy.
